title: "Ingredients"

## Fatalii Fuyu Sauce

Home grown Fatalii peppers, home grown Fuyu persimmons, roasted bell peppers, white vinegar, garlic, salt, cumin; xanthan gum as stabilizer

## Tabasco 2.0 Sauce

Home grown Tabasco peppers, white vinegar, garlic; xanthan gum as stabilizer

## Plum Habanero Sauce

Home grown Habanero peppers, home grown plums, white vinegar, garlic, salt, cumin; xanthan gum as stabilizer
